acdPolicy.name: acdPolicy

revisions.description: Initial version of MIB module ACD-POLICY-MIB.

acdPolicy.contactinfo: Accedian Technical Assistance Center Accedian Networks, Inc. 4878 Levy, suite 202 Saint-Laurent, Quebec Canada H4R 2P1 E-mail: support@accedian.com
acdPolicy.description: The Policies database for this Accedian Networks device.

acdPolicyEntry.name: acdPolicyEntry
acdPolicyEntry.description: A Policy is a Filter applied to a specific MAC to block, permit or only count a specific traffic.

acdPolicyID.name: acdPolicyID
acdPolicyID.description: Unique value for each policy entry. Its value ranges from 1 to MAXINT (4 bytes).

acdPolicyListID.name: acdPolicyListID
acdPolicyListID.description: This object identifies in wich List the entry is.

acdPolicyEntryID.name: acdPolicyEntryID
acdPolicyEntryID.description: This object identifies the order in the List.

acdPolicyEnable.name: acdPolicyEnable
acdPolicyEnable.description: Enable or disable the Policy in the packet processing Engine.

acdPolicyFilterType.name: acdPolicyFilterType
acdPolicyFilterType.description: This indicates which filter type is programmed in this entry. With the filter index we can retrieve the specific filter in the filter database.

acdPolicyFilterIndex.name: acdPolicyFilterIndex
acdPolicyFilterIndex.description: This indicates which filter index is programmed in this entry. With the filter type we can retrieve the specific filter in the filter database.

acdPolicyDropEnable.name: acdPolicyDropEnable
acdPolicyDropEnable.description: ********* THIS OBJECT IS DEPRECATED ********** This object has been deprecated in favour of acdPolicyAction. This indicates if this policy is programmed to drop or let the traffic pass the processing engine.

acdPolicyMonitorEnable.name: acdPolicyMonitorEnable
acdPolicyMonitorEnable.description: This indicates if this policy is programmed to send the traffic to one of the monitoring port.

acdPolicyMonitorIndex.name: acdPolicyMonitorIndex
acdPolicyMonitorIndex.description: This indicates which monitor port is programmed to send the traffic matching this policy entry.

acdPolicyRegulatorEnable.name: acdPolicyRegulatorEnable
acdPolicyRegulatorEnable.description: This indicates if this policy use or not a bandwidth regulator.

acdPolicyRegulatorIndex.name: acdPolicyRegulatorIndex
acdPolicyRegulatorIndex.description: This indicates which bandwidth regulator index is programmed in this policy entry.

acdPolicyRegulatorMarking.name: acdPolicyRegulatorMarking
acdPolicyRegulatorMarking.description: This indicates the pre-marking color associated with this policy.

acdPolicyAction.name: acdPolicyAction
acdPolicyAction.description: Action that will be applied to traffic that matches the filter.

acdPolicyEvcMappingEncaps.name: acdPolicyEvcMappingEncaps
acdPolicyEvcMappingEncaps.description: Action that will be applied to traffic that matches the filter.

acdPolicyEvcMappingEtype.name: acdPolicyEvcMappingEtype
acdPolicyEvcMappingEtype.description: The ethertype of the VLAN to be added if the encapsulation is set to push. Possible values are customer VLAN (cvlan) and service VLAN (svlan).

acdPolicyEvcMappingVlanId.name: acdPolicyEvcMappingVlanId
acdPolicyEvcMappingVlanId.description: The VLAN ID to be added if the encapsulation is set to push. Its value ranges from 0 to 4095.

acdPolicyCosMappingPcpAction.name: acdPolicyCosMappingPcpAction
acdPolicyCosMappingPcpAction.description: This section selects the PCP (Priority Code Points) action to perform. Possible values are: Preserve: Keep the PCP bits if the packet is already tagged Direct: Add the default PCP value Map: Use a CoS profile for PCP selection For each PCP action there is one or two traffic mapping choices and the default PCP bits to use if the packet does not match the first and the second choices.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1En.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1En
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1En.description: This indicates if this choice is used.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Type.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Type
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Type.description: The traffic mapping is accomplished using the selected field in the incoming traffic. This field can be p-bits in 802.1Q, 802.1Q-in-Q tags IP precedence bits in IPv4 TOS byte or DSCP bits in IPv4 DSCP byte.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Profile.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Profile
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1Profile.description: CoS profile used to map the input traffic to an L2 class of service.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1RegSet.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1RegSet
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice1RegSet.description: Bandwidth regulator apply to regulate traffic.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2En.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2En
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2En.description: This indicates if this choice is used.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Type.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Type
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Type.description: The traffic mapping is accomplished using the selected field in the incoming traffic. This field can be p-bits in 802.1Q, 802.1Q-in-Q tags IP precedence bits in IPv4 TOS byte or DSCP bits in IPv4 DSCP byte.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Profile.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Profile
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2Profile.description: CoS profile used to map the input traffic to an L2 class of service.

acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2RegSet.name: acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2RegSet
acdPolicyCosMappingChoice2RegSet.description: Bandwidth regulator apply to regulate traffic.

acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenCfi.name: acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenCfi
acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenCfi.description: The default CFI value to be applied if the Encapsulation is Push. This would only be applied if the traffic does not match the first and second choices and if the result color is green.

acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenPrior.name: acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenPrior
acdPolicyDefaultMappingGreenPrior.description: The default PCP values to be applied if the Encapsulation is Push. This would only be applied if the traffic does not match the first and second choices and if the result color is green.

acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowCfi.name: acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowCfi
acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowCfi.description: The default CFI value to be applied if the Encapsulation is Push. This would only be applied if the traffic does not match the first and second choices and if the result color is green.

acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowPrior.name: acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowPrior
acdPolicyDefaultMappingYellowPrior.description: The default PCP values to be applied if the Encapsulation is Push. This would only be applied if the traffic does not match the first and second choices and if the result color is green.

acdPolicyOutgoingPort.name: acdPolicyOutgoingPort
acdPolicyOutgoingPort.description: The OID value used to identify the outgoing port for this policy. In order to identify a particular port, this object shall identify the instance of the acdPortConfigIndex object, defined in ACD-PORT-MIB, for the desired port. For example, if an entry is set to port 4, this object would be set to acdPortConfigIndex.4 and by querying the acdPortConfigName.4 the user can retrieve the name of this port.

acdPolicyStatsTable.name: acdPolicyStatsTable
acdPolicyStatsTable.description: Table of all counters associated with each policy.

acdPolicyStatsEntry.name: acdPolicyStatsEntry
acdPolicyStatsEntry.description: An Entry consists in a bytes and a packets counters.

acdPolicyStatsID.name: acdPolicyStatsID
acdPolicyStatsID.description: Unique value for each policy counter. Its value ranges from 1 to MAXINT (4 bytes).

acdPolicyStatsListID.name: acdPolicyStatsListID
acdPolicyStatsListID.description: This object identifies in wich List the entry is.

acdPolicyStatsEntryID.name: acdPolicyStatsEntryID
acdPolicyStatsEntryID.description: This object identifies the order in the List.

acdPolicyStatsInPkts.name: acdPolicyStatsInPkts
acdPolicyStatsInPkts.description: The total number of packets received on this MAC and matching this policy. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPkts, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCPkts.

acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPkts.name: acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPkts
acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPkts.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyStatsInPkts counter has overflowed. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInPkts, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCPkts.

acdPolicyStatsInHCPkts.name: acdPolicyStatsInHCPkts
acdPolicyStatsInHCPkts.description: The total number of packets received on this MAC and matching this policy.

acdPolicyStatsInOctets.name: acdPolicyStatsInOctets
acdPolicyStatsInOctets.description: The total number of Octets received on this MAC and matching this policy. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInOverflowOctets, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCOctets.

acdPolicyStatsInOverflowOctets.name: acdPolicyStatsInOverflowOctets
acdPolicyStatsInOverflowOctets.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyStatsInOctets counter has overflowed. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInOctets, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCOctets.

acdPolicyStatsInHCOctets.name: acdPolicyStatsInHCOctets
acdPolicyStatsInHCOctets.description: The total number of Octets received on this MAC and matching this policy.

acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr.name: acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr
acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr.description: The total number of errored packets received on this MAC and matching this policy. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPktsErr, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCPktsErr.

acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPktsErr.name: acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPktsErr
acdPolicyStatsInOverflowPktsErr.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr counter has overflowed. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyStatsInHCPktsErr.

acdPolicyStatsInHCPktsErr.name: acdPolicyStatsInHCPktsErr
acdPolicyStatsInHCPktsErr.description: The total number of errored packets received on this MAC and matching this policy.

acdPolicyHistStatsTable.name: acdPolicyHistStatsTable
acdPolicyHistStatsTable.description: Table of all counters associated with each policy.

acdPolicyHistStatsEntry.name: acdPolicyHistStatsEntry
acdPolicyHistStatsEntry.description: An Entry consists in a bytes and a packets counters.

acdPolicyHistStatsID.name: acdPolicyHistStatsID
acdPolicyHistStatsID.description: Unique value for each policy counter. Its value ranges from 1 to MAXINT (4 bytes).

acdPolicyHistStatsListID.name: acdPolicyHistStatsListID
acdPolicyHistStatsListID.description: This object identifies in wich List the entry is.

acdPolicyHistStatsEntryID.name: acdPolicyHistStatsEntryID
acdPolicyHistStatsEntryID.description: This object identifies the order in the List.

acdPolicyHistStatsSampleIndex.name: acdPolicyHistStatsSampleIndex
acdPolicyHistStatsSampleIndex.description: An index that uniquely identifies the particular sample this entry represents among all samples associated with the same policy instance. This index starts at 1 and increases by one as each new sample.

acdPolicyHistStatsStatus.name: acdPolicyHistStatsStatus
acdPolicyHistStatsStatus.description: The status of this acdPolicyHistStats entry.

acdPolicyHistStatsDuration.name: acdPolicyHistStatsDuration
acdPolicyHistStatsDuration.description: The interval in seconds over which the data is sampled for this entry.

acdPolicyHistStatsIntervalEnd.name: acdPolicyHistStatsIntervalEnd
acdPolicyHistStatsIntervalEnd.description: This is the time of the end of this entry.

acdPolicyHistStatsInPkts.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInPkts
acdPolicyHistStatsInPkts.description: The total number of packets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPkts, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPkts.

acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPkts.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPkts
acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPkts.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyStatsInPkts counter has overflowed during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInPkts, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPkts.

acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPkts.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPkts
acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPkts.description: The total number of packets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval.

acdPolicyHistStatsInOctets.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInOctets
acdPolicyHistStatsInOctets.description: The total number of Octets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowOctets, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCOctets.

acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowOctets.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowOctets
acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowOctets.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyHistStatsInOctets counter has overflowed during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInOctets, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCOctets.

acdPolicyHistStatsInHCOctets.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInHCOctets
acdPolicyHistStatsInHCOctets.description: The total number of Octets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval.

acdPolicyHistStatsInPktsErr.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInPktsErr
acdPolicyHistStatsInPktsErr.description: The total number of errored packets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPktsErr, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPktsErr.

acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPktsErr.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPktsErr
acdPolicyHistStatsInOverflowPktsErr.description: The number of times the associated acdPolicyStatsInPktsErr counter has overflowed during this sampling interval. This is a 32 bits counter. Combined with acdPolicyHistStatsInPktsErr, it provides the equivalent of the 64 bits counter acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPktsErr.

acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPktsErr.name: acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPktsErr
acdPolicyHistStatsInHCPktsErr.description: The total number of errored packets received on this MAC and matching this policy during this sampling interval.

acdPolicyListTable.name: acdPolicyListTable
acdPolicyListTable.description: Table of all Policy list contains in this unit.

acdPolicyListEntry.name: acdPolicyListEntry
acdPolicyListEntry.description: Each entry in this table describe a policy list contains in this unit.

acdPolicyListEntryID.name: acdPolicyListEntryID
acdPolicyListEntryID.description: Unique value for each list. This value is the same than acdPolicyListID for each entry in acdPolicyTable.

acdPolicyListName.name: acdPolicyListName
acdPolicyListName.description: This is a string to identify the policy list.

acdPolicyListNbrEntries.name: acdPolicyListNbrEntries
acdPolicyListNbrEntries.description: The number of entries currently in this list.

acdPolicyPortTable.name: acdPolicyPortTable
acdPolicyPortTable.description: Table of all Port and the correspondant policy list.

acdPolicyPortEntry.name: acdPolicyPortEntry
acdPolicyPortEntry.description: A Policy port entry is the mapping between this port and a policy list.

acdPolicyPortEntryID.name: acdPolicyPortEntryID
acdPolicyPortEntryID.description: Unique value for each port. This value is the same than acdPortConfigIndex used in ACD-PORT-MIB.

acdPolicyTableLastChangeTid.name: acdPolicyTableLastChangeTid
acdPolicyTableLastChangeTid.description: This is the transaction ID of the last change of the acdPolicyTable table. If this value is different since the last read this is indicate a table change.

acdPolicyGroup.name: acdPolicyGroup
acdPolicyGroup.description: Objects for the policy configuration Group.

acdPolicyStatsGroup.name: acdPolicyStatsGroup
acdPolicyStatsGroup.description: Objects for the policy statistics Group.

acdPolicyHistStatsGroup.name: acdPolicyHistStatsGroup
acdPolicyHistStatsGroup.description: Objects for the policy historical tatistics Group.

acdPolicyDeprecatedGroup.name: acdPolicyDeprecatedGroup
acdPolicyDeprecatedGroup.description: Objects for the policy deprecated Group.

acdPolicyListGroup.name: acdPolicyListGroup
acdPolicyListGroup.description: Objects for the policy list information Group.

acdPolicyPortGroup.name: acdPolicyPortGroup
acdPolicyPortGroup.description: Objects for the policy port mapping Group.

acdPolicyTidGroup.name: acdPolicyTidGroup
acdPolicyTidGroup.description: List of scalars to monitior changes in tables.

acdPolicyCompliance.name: acdPolicyCompliance
acdPolicyCompliance.description: The compliance statement for support of the ACD-POLICY-MIB module.
